participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing her thoughts with others. She is passionate about reading and has an adventurous spirit.
participant_1.background: I started a small blog lately to post reviews. I have found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with. I started collaborating with some popular publishers. I have none to share my thoughts about the books I read. I love to read.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Analytical and pragmatic, David enjoys solving problems and is detail-oriented. He is friendly and loves sharing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: My father used to work for a bank. I went to college and graduated a few years ago. Now I also work at a bank. I grew up in the upstate. I live in the city.

content.text: Hello, do you like to read books?
Yes, I do. I love reading.
Me too! What are your favorite genres?
I like to read a variety of genres, but my favorites are mystery, thriller, and historical fiction.
I love mystery and thriller books too! What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins, The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo by Stieg Larsson, and Gone Girl by Gillian Flynn.
I've heard good things about those books! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! I think you'll like them.
So, what do you do for a living?
I work at a bank.
Oh, really? I used to work at a bank too.
No way! Where did you work?
I worked at the bank in the upstate.
Oh, I've never been there.
It's a beautiful area. There's a lot of hiking and camping to be done.
That sounds like fun. I love to hike.
We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be great!
It's settled then. We'll go hiking soon.
I'm looking forward to it.
